comments:
I selected the Apache Log Correlation/Analyzer sample, keep the defaults and 
press finish
I get this exception in the log file ( the wizard doesn't close and the files 
are not imported )
I tried to debug the problem and it seams that is something wrong with the user 
input sent to the parser
